languages.text: "Посягнувший на подател{mf|я|ьницу} жизни не услышит сигнал следующей вахты".
"Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."
languages.original_text: "Посягнувший на подател{mf|я|ьницу} жизни не услышит сигнал следующей вахты".

traits.locale_text: "One who raises a hand at the life-giver will not live to hear the next watch signal."
"One who raises a hand at the life-giver will not live to hear the next watch signal."
"Those who raise a hand against the life-giver will not live to hear the next watch signal."
"Those who raise a hand against the life-giver will not live to hear the next watch signal."
"Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."
"Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."

languages.text: «Quienes levantan la mano contra el Dador de Vida no llegarán a oír la próxima señal de guardia».
languages.original_text: "Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."

traits.locale_text: «Quienes levantan la mano contra el Dador de Vida no llegarán a oír la próxima señal de guardia».

languages.text: 「生命を与える者に対して手を上げる者は、次のウォッチの合図まで生きられないだろう」
languages.original_text: "Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."

traits.locale_text: 「生命を与える者に対して手を上げる者は、次のウォッチの合図まで生きられないだろう」

languages.text: “胆敢对赐命者刀剑相向之人，注定无法听到下一巡的钟声。”
languages.original_text: "Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."

traits.locale_text: “胆敢对赐命者刀剑相向之人，注定无法听到下一巡的钟声。”

languages.text: "Wer eine Hand gegen den Lebensspender erhebt, wird das nächste Wachsignal nicht mehr hören."
languages.original_text: "Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."

traits.locale_text: "Wer eine Hand gegen den Lebensspender erhebt, wird das nächste Wachsignal nicht mehr hören."

languages.text: « Ceux qui osent lever la main sur la Source de vie ne vivront pas assez longtemps pour entendre le prochain signal de changement de quart. »
languages.original_text: "Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui osent lever la main sur la Source de vie ne vivront pas assez longtemps pour entendre le prochain signal de changement de quart. »

languages.text: "Can Bahşeden'e elini kaldıranlar, bir sonraki vardiya sinyalini duyacak kadar yaşamayacak."
languages.original_text: "Those who raise a hand against the Giver of Life will not live to hear the next watch signal."
